layout.css: flex-wrap:wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: start; display: flex;

layout.options: 1 - AOG Setting (default),2 - Quadrature Encoder,3 - JD Variable Duty Encoder,4 - WAS-PWM Ratio,5 - Encoder Speed

layout.format:
Send these commands via USB Serial
c :Toggles CPU usage msg
lX :Sets RGB LED brightness (X: 0-5)
mX :Sets Machine debugging level (X: 0-5)
n :Toggles NMEA debugging
n2 :Toggles NMEA2 debugging
s :Toggles UART buffer stats msg
r :Resets UART buffer stats
